column15: x #Merge with Other Military societies / Split between races?

column2: Fighting rats is slow and treacherous resulting only minor territorial Gains §Y(You will only Gain Target title)§! from [from.GetTitledFirstName]!
Fighting mountainside Warfare is slow and treacherous resulting only minor territorial Gains §Y(You will only Gain Target title)§! from [from.GetTitledFirstName]!
Annexes Controlled Border Territory §Y(OR Close enough to your own border)§! from [from.GetTitledFirstName]!
Annexes Controlled deep Border Territory §Y(Greenskins can get more from other Warlike Races)§! from [from.GetTitledFirstName]!
Has NOT used §YCall of the War§! in the past §Y5 years§!
By Honor and Dignity, TO WAR MEN!

The fervor of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] runs still through the veins of the people of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. When called to action, they rush to defense of the realm, gathering weapons and ride to my banner, ready to show once more the strength and ruthlessness of their ancestors to all those who oppose us.
The Knightly Orders of Old World
Enables a decision in the §YIntrigue§! menu for §Y[dwarf_gods_group.GetName]§! rulers to request help from the Warriors Guild when waging a war.
The Drums of War have Sung, the war has begun against mostly dishonorable enemy, the Nobility of your cause will surely be helped.
Use your influence with [Root.Society.GetName] to gather any faithful fighters wandering in your realm..
Enables a decision in the §YIntrigue§! menu for members of [Root.Society.GetName] to speed recruitment across the realm.
There are still semi-nomadic bands of warriors wandering

Hail, [Root.GetSocietyRank]!

The Grudge against [my_war_target_holder.GetTitledFirstName] is to be settled, ripe for the grudging! If you seek to impress [Root.Society.GetName], [Root.GetMarchSail] [my_war_target.PrimaryTitle.GetName]!

Signed, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
The Quest to Settle the Grudge is to be considered Settled, Surely Impressing Warriors Guild

The Warrior Guild is the largest of all, and is found in almost every Dawi community. These clans provide the elite troops of most Dawi armies. Some Warrior clans specialize in the use of missile weapons, such as crossbows and handguns.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your own character portrait, in order to prepare training to become a proper Dawi Warrior.
The Decision to appoint Somebody as Shieldmaiden of Valaya becomes available, provided she is your sister or daughter and Follows Norse Ancestral Faith.
Choose fighting style as a dawi warrior
Become one of the honoured Iron Breakers or Longbeards
Become one of the honoured Iron Breakers or Longbeards
It is High Time this grudge is to be settled and striken from the Book of Grudges

Knights are magnificent figures, clad in gleaming Full Plate Armour crafted by Dwarfen smiths, armed with weaponry of the finest quality. Because the cost of individual knightly training is prohibitively expensive, many sons of nobility choose to join one of the many brotherhoods located throughout the Old World as a way to progress through society, and as such, the Knightly Orders come in many different shape and sizes.
The Secular leader of the Knightly orders around the old world speak in behalf of all of the orders pledging themselves to the authority of nobility and honor.

The Warrior craftguild is the largest of all, and is found in almost every Dwarf community. These clans provide the elite troops of most Dwarf armies. Some Warrior clans specialize in the use of missile weapons, such as crossbows and handguns.
Pledge yourself to one of the Knightly orders of Old world
Pledge yourself to one of the Knightly orders of Old world
The Time has come to pledge yourselfs to one of the various Knightly Orders around the old world, which ever would you want to make a dedication to join to?
